channel.title: Straiten hair without straiteners?
channel.description: I have an interview for Asda (Wallmart) tomorrow morning after my OT appointment in the morning. My straighteners are broken and I don't want to wake my sister up cause she'll get pissy and I [s]want[/s] need straight hair to go with my clothes(which are pretty damn hot). So how do I do it? When I use a brush it'll go wavey[b]D:[/b]. I only want to straiten the fringe. Help D:?

go in with sex her and tell the manager you juss got done banging his wife.

@SilentCJ wrote:

Dry it like a muthafucka when you get out of the shower and then hair dry it, that’s pretty much what I do, I have homosexual tendency’s too but it’s cool guys.

blow dry and at the same time use a large round brush to pull hair straight and curl under.

get a haircut. employers dont like people with long hair.

and I probably wouldn’t hire pretty boys who use straighteners

Any other suggestions? Btw ty

item.title: Straiten hair without straiteners?
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

krackkid:

All I mean by it is I don’t see the big deal with burning your hair, All though my hair is naturally straight so I don’t understand anyways.

My hairs not naturally straight anymore, its slightly wavey and since I’m the type of guy that likes to have a neat fringe and sides straitening is essential for the fringe.
Basically, it makes a big difference in my looks.

@Andrew, would a big beanie work? I don’t have any small hat’s cause they look retarded on me:L. They probably don’t but I do aha. I’ll either going out looking like a state on purpose(like completely not bother so its obvious) or make an effort.

@Rex Doesn’t work like that for me since my hairs slightly wavey, trust me i’ve trieed. Straitenings a pain and i’d do that if i could.

Read full topic

item.title: Straiten hair without straiteners?
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

I shower in the morning…

Basically wash, then take a towel and vigorously rub back and forth over your hair for 1-3 minutes, then shape to your liking and let it mold to perfection.

Read full topic

item.title: Straiten hair without straiteners?
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

If you have a tight winter hat put it over your head for 1-2 hours, that’s what I do, I take a shower then sleep in the hat so i wake up with strait hair. I don’t honestly think walmart cares about how you look though, I mean come on, its walmart.

Read full topic
